snippet.title: The Legendary Prophecy of Light and Darkness - The Power to Save the World (2018) Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready for the most epic adventure of your life in this new jrpg video game I'm working on. Heavily inspired by games such as persona, undertale, and cave story. Scheduled for a PC release in early 2018. A Kickstarter will be coming soon so you can help me  fund this project.

until then, please help spread the news that I'm working on this. It will really help me in production! 

Gameplay will also be coming soon.
